name: certs
desc: manage ssl endpoints for an app

params.name: -r, --remote REMOTE
params.desc: git remote of app to run command against

subcommands.name: certs:add CRT KEY
subcommands.desc: Add an ssl endpoint to an app.

subcommands.name: certs:chain CRT [CRT ...]
subcommands.desc: Print the ordered and complete chain for the given certificate.

subcommands.name: certs:generate DOMAIN
subcommands.desc: Generate a key and certificate signing request (or self-signed certificate)

subcommands.name: certs:info
subcommands.desc: Show certificate information for an ssl endpoint.

subcommands.name: certs:key CRT KEY [KEY ...]
subcommands.desc: Print the correct key for the given certificate.

subcommands.name: certs:remove
subcommands.desc: Remove an SSL Endpoint from an app.

subcommands.name: certs:rollback
subcommands.desc: Rollback an SSL Endpoint for an app.

subcommands.name: certs:update CRT KEY
subcommands.desc: Update an SSL Endpoint on an app.
